summary: Comprehensive testing of SocialFlow AI platform completed. Both major fixes successfully verified: (1) Template category dropdown now works correctly in modal, (2) Session persistence working via axios defaults. Backend APIs fully functional (20/20 tests - 100% success rate). Frontend core workflows operational with both critical fixes confirmed working.

integration_issues.issue: Session expires after extended testing periods, causing 401 errors on subsequent requests
affected_selectors: Protected routes after long idle time

design_issues.issue: Multiple 'Failed to load resource: net::ERR_NAME_NOT_RESOLVED' console errors
design_issues.note: Placeholder image URLs causing 404s but not affecting functionality

passed_tests: ✅ MAJOR FIX VERIFIED: Template category dropdown selection works in modal
✅ MAJOR FIX VERIFIED: Session persistence working - direct navigation to protected routes successful
Backend API comprehensive testing (20/20 tests passed - 100% success rate)
User registration with automatic dashboard redirect
Template creation modal opening and form fields
Template category dropdown opening and option selection
Navigation between protected routes (Dashboard, Templates, Landing Pages, Leads)
Landing page creation modal and form
Session persistence across multiple page navigations
All CRUD operations for posts, templates, landing pages, campaigns
